betterquesting.name: Player Housing
betterquesting.desc:
One of the new aspects in Middle-earth is player housing.  Now new and improved over previous version!

Just speak to any of the Real Estate agents to learn more.  There are three, one near Rivendell, one near Edoras and the third inside Minas Tirith.

tasks.description:
Real Estate agents in Middle-earth can help you find that perfect home if you just let them.  There are 3 to start out with, one near Rivendell, one near Edoras and the last inside Minas Tirith.  Speak to any one of them to learn more about player housing.

Server admins will be able to add more if needed using the template and deciding on houses.

betterquesting.name: Eriador
betterquesting.desc: Work available in the Eriador region

betterquesting.name: Ancient Evil
betterquesting.desc:
The key will need to be reforged. It will take no skill, but certainly time, to reforge the key.

To get the fragments you will need to find and defeat the Wight-lords Tahrub & Burhat as well as the Guant-man Ranler.

Lore:9.8: §6A gift for your efforts
§6A gift for your efforts
§6A gift for your efforts

betterquesting.name: Men of Middle-earth: Known
betterquesting.desc:
Throughout Middle-earth there are various factions, who may reward you if you gain sufficient standing in their eyes.

Faction may be gained by completing quests, defeating specific mobs, or turning in specific mob-drop items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

At this point the Men of Middle-earth have heard of you and know your name.

betterquesting.name: Ancient Evil I
betterquesting.desc: A small band of adventurers have made camp outside the Great Barrows and one named Falsir is looking for some help.

tasks.description: Go speak to Falsir near the Great Barrow.

betterquesting.name: In Need of Supplies
betterquesting.desc: Henry has a buyer for Zombie Flesh and is looking for anyone willing to make a quick bit of coin and help out the Men of Middle-earth.

tasks.description: See what Henry has to offer.

betterquesting.name: A Cauldron of Iron
betterquesting.desc: The Captain of the Guard, Riplette, at the West Gate of Bree, is looking for some help collecting supplies for a cauldron.  Go see if you can help.

tasks.description: Speak to the Captain of the Guard.

betterquesting.name: Forging Anew II
betterquesting.desc: Reeve Guibe reforged the key to the Great Barrow. You should return to Falsir for further instruction.

betterquesting.name: A Daily Hunt
betterquesting.desc: [mobs] have gotten out of control near [place].  [npc] has put out a call for help to try to bring them under control.

betterquesting.name: Forging Anew
betterquesting.desc:
Reeve Guibe is in Blacksmith's Row, west of The Prancing Pony and south-west of the stables.

Falsir told you to bring the key fragments to Reeve Guibe, a blacksmith who has had a recent run of bad luck.

tasks.description: Make sure to speak to Reeve Guibe.

betterquesting.name: A Daily Hunt
betterquesting.desc: Zombies have gotten out of control near The Forsaken Inn.  Divina has put out a call for help to try to bring them under control.

betterquesting.name: Final Chapter I
betterquesting.desc: You must defeat the wight-lord Zaemrohn then speak to Falsir.

Lore:9.8: §6A gift for your efforts
§6A gift for your efforts
§6A gift for your efforts
§6A gift for your efforts
§6A gift for your efforts
§6A gift for your efforts
§6A gift for your efforts
§6A gift for your efforts

betterquesting.name: Monk of the Maze
betterquesting.desc:
Seek out the wise monk of the maze in the player housing area near the Temple for information about getting around faster.

Once you have you will be granted access to the temple itself and all of it's secrets!

tasks.description: Maybe a faster way to get around could help?

betterquesting.name: In Need of Supplies
betterquesting.desc: [npc] has a buyer for [mob drop] and is looking for anyone willing to make a quick bit of coin and help out [faction]

betterquesting.name: Money Changer
betterquesting.desc: Some important people handle all the monies of Middle-earth, perhaps you should speak with the Money Changer?

betterquesting.name: Getting Started
betterquesting.desc: hidden quest to prevent early completion before talking to aragorn.

betterquesting.name: Research & Help
betterquesting.desc: There are some who study the history of Middle-earth and as a result have a keen insight into what goes on.  Speak to the NPC to find out what he can do for you.

betterquesting.name: Getting Around
betterquesting.desc: There are multiple ways to move swiftly in Middle-earth, talk to the stable master for more information.

betterquesting.name: Full of knowledge
betterquesting.desc: Task complete! Time to go back to speak with Aragorn again.

betterquesting.name: Edhellond
betterquesting.desc: Fast Travel

betterquesting.name: Troubles of Rivendell
betterquesting.desc:
It has been many years, but you find yourself back at Rivendell, facing Aragorn. He has a dour look upon his brow as if he has many things weighing on him.

Reach out to him, see what has transpired since last you two spoke.

betterquesting.name: Wisdom of Lord Glorfindel II
betterquesting.desc: Take the gem Lord Glorfindel bestowed upon you and see what you can find out.

betterquesting.name: Welcome to Middle-earth
betterquesting.desc: Quest created to completed at player load for the scoreboards that will be in place to fix a UUID error with non-zero scores.

betterquesting.name: You have new Quests!
betterquesting.desc: Time to seek out the trolls

Lore:9.8: §6Notes Elladan provided to help you find the caves.

betterquesting.name: Where is the Horse & Rider?
betterquesting.desc: Now that you are situated, time to heed Aragon's wish and go speak to Lord Elrond in the library north of Aragorn.

betterquesting.name: Hiding in the Dark - Bandrith
betterquesting.desc: Elladan has determined that the missing Rider may be hiding in one of the many caves near the Black Steed in the Trollshaws and wants you to search several of them with Glorfindel's beryl.

Lore:9.8: §eProof of killing the troll.

betterquesting.name: Hiding in the Dark - Hoklond
betterquesting.desc: Elladan has determined that the missing Rider may be hiding in one of the many caves near the Black Steed in the Trollshaws and wants you to search several of them with Glorfindel's beryl.

Lore:9.8: §eProof of killing the troll.

betterquesting.name: Hiding in the Dark - Sholdroth
betterquesting.desc: Elladan has determined that the missing Rider may be hiding in one of the many caves near the Black Steed in the Trollshaws and wants you to search several of them with Glorfindel's beryl.

Lore:9.8: §eProof of killing the troll.

betterquesting.name: Aid of Mirkwood III
betterquesting.desc: Legolas recognized the creature you described as a Wood-troll and has agreed to show you where to track the rest down.

betterquesting.name: Regaining the Trail
betterquesting.desc: Now that you have seen what Lord Glorindel's gem does, time to take it back.

betterquesting.name: Knowledge of the Giants I
betterquesting.desc: Now that you have searched the caves, return to Elledan to what to do next.

betterquesting.name: Missing Rider
betterquesting.desc: That the elves have not found the missing rider is worrisome.  Hopefully you will be able to lend a hand to Elrond's son, Elledan.

betterquesting.name: Wisdom of Lord Glorfindel I
betterquesting.desc: Elledan seems to have a solution based on what you found.  Seek out lord Glorfindel at the Imladris Waterfall.

betterquesting.name: Aid of Mirkwood
betterquesting.desc: After speaking to Barachen it is time to hunt down the Giant and hopefully get more information about the Nazgul.

betterquesting.name: Aid of Mirkwood II
betterquesting.desc: Elladan seems to think it important to speak with his father, Elrond, as he is the one to grant a meeting with the elves of Mirkwood to gain what knowledge you can from them regarding what you have seen so far in the Trollshaws.

betterquesting.name: Hasten Their Departure
betterquesting.desc: With everything that has happened, Legolas can no longer be delayed and asks that you report your findings to Lord Elrond and see where things will go from here.

betterquesting.name: Onward Misty Mountains
betterquesting.desc: You were able to thwart the designs of the Nazgûl but he escaped, time to report to Elrond.

betterquesting.name: Elves of Rivendell: Known
betterquesting.desc:
Throughout Middle-earth there are various factions, who may reward you if you gain sufficient standing in their eyes.

Faction may be gained by completing quests, defeating specific mobs, or turning in specific mob-drop items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Lore:9.8: §eMagical gem loaned to you to help on your search

betterquesting.name: Received Glorfindel's Beryl
betterquesting.desc: Quest to bestow beryl

Lore:9.8: §eMagical gem loaned to you to help on your search

betterquesting.name: Hiding in the Dark
betterquesting.desc: Go back to Elledan and see what new information he may have as well in the search for the Nazgul.

betterquesting.name: Knowledge of the Giants II
betterquesting.desc: Time to go see what information this scout, Barachen, has uncovered.

betterquesting.name: Troublesome Goblins II
betterquesting.desc:
Glóin is at his camp north of Rivendell.

In defeating Ulmug, you find him accompanied by hostile Dourhand dwarves. Glóin should be made known of this development immediately

betterquesting.name: Last Refuge II
betterquesting.desc: With the Key-stone in hand, you can now enter the dwarf-keep in Gundabad, the last refuge of the Dourhands and confront both the Nazgûl and Dugorim.

betterquesting.name: Fire n Ice
betterquesting.desc:
Carn Dûm is far to the north-west of Rivendell.

Elrond fears the body of the dragon left to rot so long ago in Carn Dûm may now be used by the Gaunt-lord to create a terrible fell-creature called a Dragon Wight and he wants you to go and attempt to stop it from happening.

betterquesting.name: Dwarves of Erebor: Known
betterquesting.desc:
Throughout Middle-earth there are various factions, who may reward you if you gain sufficient standing in their eyes.Faction may be gained by completing quests, defeating specific mobs, or turning in specific mob-drop items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

betterquesting.name: Chapter Start 1
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Chapter Start 2
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Troublesome Goblins I
betterquesting.desc: Elrond has suggested speaking to Glóin to further your search for the Nazgûl.

betterquesting.name: Baggin's Birthday
betterquesting.desc: Frodo Baggins is looking for an adventurer to help in a birthday surprise for his uncle Bilbo! Travel to Rivendell to find out how you can be of assistance.

betterquesting.name: Job Board Quests
betterquesting.desc: No Description

rewards.command: /tellraw VAR_NAME {"text":"[name:\"Eriador Job Board\", x:9340, y:55, z:7831]"}
/tellraw VAR_NAME {"text":"[name:\"Gondor Job Board\", x:17957, y:37, z:13646]"}
/tellraw VAR_NAME {"text":"[name:\"Rhovanion Job Board\", x:20276, y:64, z:4277]"}
/tellraw VAR_NAME {"text":"[name:\"Rohan Job Board\", x:14695, y:51, z:12300]"}

Lore:9.8: §6Story told by a hobbit after Bilbo disappeared on his birthday.

betterquesting.name: Gaffer I
betterquesting.desc: The Gaffer seems to know a lot about the goings-on in Hobbiton, Frodo has asked you to speak with him and try to get some stories from various hobbits about what they say at Bilbo's last party before leaving the shire.

betterquesting.name: Baggin's Birthday
betterquesting.desc: Time to seek out all of the hobbits the Gaffer mentioned to get the stories they have to tell.

Lore:9.8: §6Story told by a hobbit after Bilbo disappeared on his birthday.

betterquesting.name: Gaffer II
betterquesting.desc: You've collected all of the stories, go see the Gaffer again to see if he has anything else to say.

betterquesting.name: Bilbo's Present
betterquesting.desc: You've collected the stories and the Gaffer even made them into a book specially for him.  Take it back and present the presant to Bilbo.

betterquesting.name: Journal Updated
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: A Cauldron of Iron
betterquesting.desc: The Captain of the Guard, [npc], at [place], is looking for some help collecting supplies for a cauldron.  Go see if you can help.

tasks.description: Speak to the Captain of the Guard.

betterquesting.name: Mitheithel
betterquesting.desc: Fast Travel

betterquesting.name: Return to Gundabad
betterquesting.desc: Glóin told you that the Nazgûl you are pursuing can be found in the old dwarf-fortress of Gundabad, in the company of Dugorim Dourhand. The two entered the nearly impregnable inner keep of the fortress. Glóin believes the only way to enter the inner keep is to learn its secret entrance.

betterquesting.name: Hunt for the Key-stone
betterquesting.desc: Glóin has asked you to retrieve a key-stone from an old dwarf-vault. The key-stone will allow you entry into the Dourhand-occupied dwarf-keep.

betterquesting.name: Last Refuge I
betterquesting.desc:
With the Key-stone found, you can now enter the dwarf-keep in Gundabad, the last refuge of the Dourhands and confront both the Nazgûl and Dugorim.

Gimli is located near the secret entrance to Gundabad, follow the compass in your journal to find him to gain entrance to Gundabad.

betterquesting.name: Steps of Evil I
betterquesting.desc: Upon hearing that the Nazgûl fled to Carn Dûm, Glóin told you some of the tale of that ancient fortress.

betterquesting.name: Steps of Evil II
betterquesting.desc:
Near one of the entrances to Carn Dûm you encountered wights.

After killing a few you found a §5Dark Sigil§r so you should return to Glóin and see what he thinks.

betterquesting.name: Turning to the South I
betterquesting.desc:
The threat in Carn Dûm has been dealt with and now Elrond wants to discuss other matters with you.

Speak with him in Rivendell.

betterquesting.name: Chapter Start 3
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Daring Rescue - A Cry for Help
betterquesting.desc:
Looks like someone near the Forsaken Inn is looking for help after a recent expedition went bad.

Look for a man named Munce to see what he needs.

betterquesting.name: Daring Rescue - Get to Safety
betterquesting.desc: Munce directed you to where they were camping to the south in the Andrath Ruins.  Hopefully Ayduin is still alive and can be brought back.

betterquesting.name: Daring Rescue - Brought to Safety
betterquesting.desc: You found Ayduin, she's badly injured but mobile.  Lead her to the western Arch and to safety!

betterquesting.name: Click the waypoint in chat to add.
betterquesting.desc: Click the waypoint in chat to add.

betterquesting.name: Click the waypoint in chat to add.
betterquesting.desc: Click the waypoint in chat to add.

betterquesting.name: Click the waypoint in chat to add.
betterquesting.desc: Click the waypoint in chat to add.

betterquesting.name: You have been given a key.
betterquesting.desc: Gloin's men found this along the mountain pass.

betterquesting.name: Faction Rewards
betterquesting.desc: Earn free rewards from your faction standing.  Come back every 30 minutes for your rewards.

Lore:9.8: §6Used to increase faction standing at specific vendors
§6Use this at certain faction sellers to purchase powerful items.

betterquesting.name: Men of Middle-earth: Friend
betterquesting.desc:
Throughout Middle-earth there are various factions, who may reward you if you gain sufficient standing in their eyes.

Faction may be gained by completing quests, defeating specific mobs, or turning in specific mob-drop items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Once reached you will be able to earn faction tokens once a day in an effort to aid you in becoming more well-known and for use at faction sellers.

Lore:9.8: §6Use this at certain faction sellers to purchase powerful items.
§6Used to increase faction standing at specific vendors

betterquesting.name: Faction Vendor
betterquesting.desc:
Increase your faction standing with the Dwarves of Erebor by submitting special tokens.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This quest will repeat so you can continue to submit as often as you want.

Lore:9.8: §6Used to increase faction standing at specific vendors

betterquesting.name: Men of Middle-earth: Kindred
betterquesting.desc:
Throughout Middle-earth there are various factions, who may reward you if you gain sufficient standing in their eyes.

Faction may be gained by completing quests, defeating specific mobs, or turning in specific mob-drop items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

They now consider you one of their own.  As such you will have access to better faction sellers who have unique items normally only available to members of their community. You will also now have access to hire mercenaries from some of the strongest of men.

Lore:9.8: §6Use this at certain faction sellers to purchase powerful items.

betterquesting.name: Known to All - Fellowship
betterquesting.desc:
Throughout Middle-earth there are various factions, who may reward you if you gain sufficient standing in their eyes.

Faction may be gained by completing quests, defeating specific mobs, or turning in specific mob-drop items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You have done such deeds as to be written in history.  Through your efforts the peoples of Middle-earth have united around one common cause...You.

betterquesting.name: Faction Rewards
betterquesting.desc: Earn free rewards from your faction standing.  Come back every 30 minutes for your rewards.

Lore:9.8: §6Used to increase faction standing at specific vendors
§6Use this at certain faction sellers to purchase powerful items.

betterquesting.name: Chapter Start 4
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Cromhes and Moria
betterquesting.desc: A trained falcon arrived at Rivendell, bearing a troubling message from the hidden Ranger-camp at Mitheithel for Aragorn, Chieftain of the Rangers.

betterquesting.name: Against His Leader
betterquesting.desc: Guthwine told you of how a wounded falcon arrived, bearing a message from Manwyn, a Ranger from the company of Cromhes, who defied Aragorn's commands and passed into Khazad-dûm, believing that a shadow had come again there.

betterquesting.name: Secrets of the Watchers
betterquesting.desc: Manwyn believes that the secret of of the Watchers can be revealed by investigating one of the pedestals they rest on. He has instructed you to carefully approach one of the Watchers and take a rubbing of the runes upon it. He warned you to be very careful of the fell and deadly Watchers.

betterquesting.name: Heart of the Watchers
betterquesting.desc: The rubbing you made showed runes of a foul nature, written in the Black Speech, which Manwyn is not well-versed in; however, he was able to make out something about the "heart" of the stone.

betterquesting.name: The Priest’s Doom
betterquesting.desc: While the stone-heart you found was cracked and useless, another path still remains open. Corunir has learned of a ritual taking place at the fortress of Dol Guldur, which may yield a whole heart if interrupted.

betterquesting.name: Into the Darkness of Khazad-dûm
betterquesting.desc: Manwyn bade you pass through the Watchers, for you no longer have cause to fear the deadly stones. He hopes that you may find a remnant of the force Cromhes led through the stones somewhere on the other side.

Lore:9.8: §6Proof of defeating the Watcher

betterquesting.name: Challenging the Watcher
betterquesting.desc: Manwyn believes the charm he placed on you will allow you passage through the Watchers, but warns that it may draw an Ancient spirit out you must defeat.

betterquesting.name: Hidden in Shadow
betterquesting.desc: Manwyn bade you pass through the Watchers, for you no longer have cause to fear the deadly stones. He hopes that you may find a remnant of the force Cromes led through the stones somewhere on the other side.

betterquesting.name: Turning to the South II
betterquesting.desc:
Aragorn waits in the main house in Rivendell along the road that winds up the southern slope of the Vale of Imladris.

Elrond warned you of a growing evil within Angmar and asked you to speak with Aragorn.

betterquesting.name: Location Marked
betterquesting.desc: Head to Stoneyford

betterquesting.name: Location Marked
betterquesting.desc: Find the Watchers

rewards.command: /tellraw VAR_NAME {"text":"[name:\"Moria: East Gate\", x:14089, y:41, z:9407]"}

betterquesting.name: Location Marked
betterquesting.desc: Find the Watchers

betterquesting.name: Click the waypoint in chat to add.
betterquesting.desc: Click the waypoint in chat to add.

betterquesting.name: Find the Cornerstone
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Men of Middle-earth: Ally
betterquesting.desc:
Throughout Middle-earth there are various factions, who may reward you if you gain sufficient standing in their eyes.

Faction may be gained by completing quests, defeating specific mobs, or turning in specific mob-drop items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

You have proven worthy in the yes of many, you now will have access to the token seller to gain even more faction.

Lore:9.8: §6Use this at certain faction sellers to purchase powerful items.
§6Used to increase faction standing at specific vendors

betterquesting.name: Men of Middle-earth: Acquaintance
betterquesting.desc:
Throughout Middle-earth there are various factions, who may reward you if you gain sufficient standing in their eyes.

Faction may be gained by completing quests, defeating specific mobs, or turning in specific mob-drop items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The people are now seeing your value and worth, at this level you can now access the faction seller in Bree to help you get better known.

Lore:9.8: §6Use this at certain faction sellers to purchase powerful items.
§6Used to increase faction standing at specific vendors

betterquesting.name: Elves of Rivendell: Acquaintance
betterquesting.desc:
Throughout Middle-earth there are various factions, who may reward you if you gain sufficient standing in their eyes.

Faction may be gained by completing quests, defeating specific mobs, or turning in specific mob-drop items.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Lore:9.8: §6Use this at certain faction sellers to purchase powerful items.
§6Used to increase faction standing at specific vendors

betterquesting.name: KeyForge Start
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Needed Supplies I
betterquesting.desc: Time for some more errands as you track down the needed supplies Lord Dáin II Ironfoot asked you to procure.

betterquesting.name: Needed Supplies II
betterquesting.desc: Take the recovered items to the dwarvwen smith and see if he can make that key.

betterquesting.name: Thrór's Hammer I
betterquesting.desc: Elssuli was able to get started, but without the proper tools he can not continue.  Head back to Lord Dain to see if he has a solution.

betterquesting.name: Return to Ember Camp
betterquesting.desc: Time to leave the dungeon and return to camp

betterquesting.name: Brimigak's Retreat
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Into the Dungeons IV
betterquesting.desc: Time to go back to the Embers Camp and reflect on what has happened.

betterquesting.name: Waypoint Added
betterquesting.desc: Check your chat for the waypoint.

betterquesting.name: Crossing the Darkness I
betterquesting.desc: You have been tasked with locating the other rangers deeper within Moria in the area known as the Flaming Deeps.

betterquesting.name: Crossing the Darkness II
betterquesting.desc: You found the camp and have spoken to Tonvid but he has bade you speak with Layles as the trouble at hand is personal for her.  She is in a nearby tent.

betterquesting.name: Crossing the Darkness III
betterquesting.desc: Apparently the rangers have sympathizers within the enemy ranks and one in particular, Fridli, has decided to help them with some potentially useful information.

betterquesting.name: Crossing the Darkness III
betterquesting.desc: You found Fridli and have obtained the scroll, time to take it back to Layles and see if it was worth the effort.

betterquesting.name: The Path Opens I
betterquesting.desc: Since the scroll was written in a strange language, referred to as the black speech, Layles has asked you to reach out to Thurdan at the Caravan Camp near the entrance of the Flaming Deeps for help.

betterquesting.name: The Path Opens II
betterquesting.desc: Thurdan has sent you to speak to Elrond who he says should have no trouble translating the scroll you found to unlock its secrets.

Lore:9.8: §6A scroll translated by Elrond with instructions to get into the dungeons of Moria.

betterquesting.name: Translated Scroll Received
betterquesting.desc: Elrond has given you a translated scroll.

Lore:9.8: §6A scroll translated by Elrond with instructions to get into the dungeons of Moria.

betterquesting.name: Dwarven Craftsman I
betterquesting.desc: You have received a translated version of the scroll and Elrond has tasked you with going to speak to Lord Dáin II Ironfoot to see if his dwarves can create the key needed.

betterquesting.name: Needed Supplies IIa
betterquesting.desc: Bilbo apparently kept a souvenier from his early exploits and may have left it at home when he travelled to Rivendell not realizing what it truly was.

Lore:9.8: §6Token Bilbo took from his adventures in the Lonely Mountain

betterquesting.name: Needed Supplies IIb
betterquesting.desc: Derwyn, the Captain of the guard in Archet is said to have a key they found that may be just what we need to make a mould.

Lore:9.8: §6Ruined key found on the body of a bandit captain

betterquesting.name: Thrór's Hammer
betterquesting.desc: Time to retrieve the tool Elssuli needs to complete our task.

betterquesting.name: Into the Dungeon I
betterquesting.desc: After some grueling tasks you have retrieved the key, time to return to Layles and see what's next.

betterquesting.name: Khedgroick's Tomb
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Waypoint Added
betterquesting.desc: Dungeon Entrance

betterquesting.name: Into the Dungeon II
betterquesting.desc: Head to the dungeon entrance and meet up with Layles to finally rescue her father Cromhes!

betterquesting.name: Into the Dungeon III
betterquesting.desc: Time to hunt for Cromhes...if he is even still here.

betterquesting.name: Ambush!
betterquesting.desc: You have been Ambushed!

betterquesting.name: Protect Layles!
betterquesting.desc: You have been ambushed, make sure Layles survives!

betterquesting.name: The Adventure Begins!
betterquesting.desc: Time to hunt...

betterquesting.name: Chapter Start 5
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: The Spirit Broken I
betterquesting.desc: The assault on the dungeon in Moria saw the freedom of the Ranger Cromhes, but proved fruitless as Layles perished, and Brimigak, the Steward of Angmar, withdrew behind a fortified area of the dungeon.

betterquesting.name: Missing Husband
betterquesting.desc: Aliz Heudebrand is asking for help finding her husband who she fears is missing.

betterquesting.name: Betan's Rescue
betterquesting.desc: You have located Betan, but now can you get him to safety?

betterquesting.name: Betan's Revenge
betterquesting.desc: You have been asked to exact revenge on the Leader of the orcs that tormented Betan while he was held captive.

Lore:9.8: §6Dropped when you defeated Tristan Storm

betterquesting.name: Gondor
betterquesting.desc: Work available in the Gondor region

betterquesting.name: Rhovanion
betterquesting.desc: Work available in the Rhovanion region.

betterquesting.name: Rohan
betterquesting.desc: Work available in the Rohan region

betterquesting.name: A Daily Hunt
betterquesting.desc: [mobs] have gotten out of control near [place].  [npc] has put out a call for help to try to bring them under control.

betterquesting.name: A Cauldron of Iron
betterquesting.desc: The Captain of the Guard, [npc], at [place], is looking for some help collecting supplies for a cauldron.  Go see if you can help.

tasks.description: Speak to the Captain of the Guard.

betterquesting.name: In Need of Supplies
betterquesting.desc: [npc] has a buyer for [mob drop] and is looking for anyone willing to make a quick bit of coin and help out [faction]

betterquesting.name: A Daily Hunt
betterquesting.desc: Skeletons have gotten out of control near Dale.  Charlice has put out a call for help to try to bring them under control.

betterquesting.name: A Cauldron of Iron
betterquesting.desc: The Captain of the Guard, [npc], at [place], is looking for some help collecting supplies for a cauldron.  Go see if you can help.

tasks.description: Speak to the Captain of the Guard.

betterquesting.name: In Need of Supplies
betterquesting.desc: [npc] has a buyer for [mob drop] and is looking for anyone willing to make a quick bit of coin and help out [faction]

betterquesting.name: Items Received
betterquesting.desc: No Description

Lore:9.8: §6Item Thonrum wanted repaired
§6Item Thonrum wanted repaired
§6Item Thonrum wanted repaired

betterquesting.name: A Dwarf-made Sword I
betterquesting.desc: Seems one of the blacksmiths in Dale is looking for help tracking down who did it.

betterquesting.name: A Dwarf-made Sword II
betterquesting.desc: Thonrum suspects three of the other blacksmiths in the market area and wants you to go interrogate them to see if one of them did it.

betterquesting.name: Getting the Sword back I
betterquesting.desc: Lucious told you that Giles left for the local Inn, almost as if he was celebrating his ability to intimidate.

Lore:9.8: §6All that remains of the dwarf-made sword

betterquesting.name: Getting the sword back II
betterquesting.desc: Wow, lucious wants to ask Thonrum to reforge the very sword he stole...well, have you ask that is...

betterquesting.name: Forging a new sword I
betterquesting.desc: For a dwarf, Thonrum is nicer than expected...with conditions.

betterquesting.name: Forging a new sword II
betterquesting.desc: Well, you are neck-deep in gather work...

betterquesting.name: A Sword for a Life I
betterquesting.desc: Giles death was blamed on lucious and they kidnapped his daughter, see if Thonrum had the Sword ready...

betterquesting.name: A Sword for a Life II
betterquesting.desc: The sword was not ready, time to confront the brigand Pierce directly!

betterquesting.name: The Spirit Broken II
betterquesting.desc: You've collected the items for Thurdan, time to head back.

Lore:9.8: §6Who knows what has been done with this shovel?
§6An ancient artifact forged in a darker time
§6Powerful tool used before the wars started
§6Sometimes up close and personal shouldn't be
§6Hope of Vengence

betterquesting.name: The Sword Apostle
betterquesting.desc: No Description

Lore:9.8: §6Hope of Vengence

betterquesting.name: Brimigak's Fall-Start
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Brimigak's Fall-Finale
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Rekindling Hope I
betterquesting.desc:
You managed to recover Cromhes' equipment, but as Thurdan pointed out to you, the gear was corroded and decayed beyond use.

You must seek out a way to restore his equipment to bring back the light to him.

betterquesting.name: Rekindling Hope II
betterquesting.desc: You managed to recover Cromhes' equipment, but as Thurdan pointed out to you, the gear was corroded and decayed beyond use.You must seek out a way to restore his equipment to bring back the light to him.

betterquesting.name: Outpost I
betterquesting.desc: The emmisaries of the enemy have retreated to outposts far to the south, go, retrieve Cromhes' items!

betterquesting.name: Outpost II
betterquesting.desc: The emmisaries of the enemy have retreated to outposts far to the south, go, retrieve Cromhes' items!

betterquesting.name: Outpost III
betterquesting.desc: The emmisaries of the enemy have retreated to outposts far to the south, go, retrieve Cromhes' items!

betterquesting.name: Rekindling Hope III
betterquesting.desc: You managed to recover Cromhes' equipment, but as Thurdan pointed out to you, the gear was corroded and decayed beyond use.You must seek out a way to restore his equipment to bring back the light to him.

betterquesting.name: Reforging the Sword I
betterquesting.desc:
The Rangers of Mitheithel were able to repair Cromhes' shield and armor, but the sword was of Elf-craft beyond their skill.

Elrond is at Rivendell.

betterquesting.name: Reforging the Sword-Smithy
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Reforging the Sword-Restart
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Reforging the Sword II
betterquesting.desc: The Rangers of Mitheithel were able to repair Cromhes' shield and armor, but the sword was of Elf-craft beyond their skill.

betterquesting.name: Hope of Vengence I
betterquesting.desc: With the sword reforged, return to Elrond to have him inspect it.

betterquesting.name: Hope of Vengence II
betterquesting.desc: Elrond renamed Cromhes’ sword Apostle, Hope of Vengence, and prophesied that it would one day avenge the death of Layles, Cromhes’ daughter.

betterquesting.name: Hope of Vengence III
betterquesting.desc: Thurdan has instructed you to return the newly reforged items to Cromhes.

betterquesting.name: Brimigak's Fall I
betterquesting.desc:
You have travelled deep into the Moria Dungeons with Cromhes, into the very sanctuary of this False-king himself. Here Cromhes hopes to confront Brimigak and shatter the Iron Crown forever.

He has provided you a means to meet with him outside Brimigak's Throne Room.

betterquesting.name: Brimigak's Fall II
betterquesting.desc: You hope to finally put an end to this false king and make him pay for what he has done.

betterquesting.name: Brimigak's Fall III
betterquesting.desc: Brimigak was defeated, but the appearance of the old woman...you wonder what part she plays in all of this.

betterquesting.name: Keeping Watch I
betterquesting.desc: Cromhes has asked that you report everything you've seen to Aragon back in Rivendell.

betterquesting.name: Keeping Watch II
betterquesting.desc: Aragorn was concerned at what you told him and has asked that you speak to Gandalf as he is busy with preparations for a secret mission that is about to happen.

betterquesting.name: Chapter Start 6
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Honouring Draconis I
betterquesting.desc: The folk of Pelargir pay tribute to the river Gilrain for the bounty it has granted its people and to honour the fabled Heroes from the Land of Draconis.

betterquesting.name: Honouring Draconis I
betterquesting.desc: The folk of Pelargir pay tribute to the river Gilrain for the bounty it has granted its people and to honour the fabled Heroes from the Land of Draconis.

Lore:9.8: §6Baskets woven to pay tribute
§6Finely woven cloth for decoration

betterquesting.name: Aubertin Unhidden I
betterquesting.desc: This mysterious person must be located and Gandalf has tasked you with meeting Cromhes who has returned to Mitheithel.

betterquesting.name: Aubertin Unhidden II
betterquesting.desc: Surprisingly Aubertin has summoned you.  Is this the cat hunting the mouse. our the mouse hunting the cat?

betterquesting.name: Aubertin’s Might I
betterquesting.desc: You can't help but wonder what she may be planning, but you have no choice but to play along...for now.

betterquesting.name: Aubertin’s Might II
betterquesting.desc: Time to head back and bring this package to Nerea.

betterquesting.name: Cromhes’ Request I
betterquesting.desc: It appears this is a far more grave threat than expected, time to report to Cromhes

betterquesting.name: Dreulhara’s Trail I
betterquesting.desc: The Knights defeated it is time to seek out the true adversary.

betterquesting.name: Dreulhara’s Trail II
betterquesting.desc: She has been tracked down and you now embark on a journey to the old city of Annúminas.

betterquesting.name: Dreulhara's Hope
betterquesting.desc: You have found the Arnos camp and found that you must cross the great lake to the ancient city of Annúminas to confrom this evil once and for all!

betterquesting.name: Cromhes’ Request - Comb
betterquesting.desc: Cromhes has asked you to return to three places where Nerea Aubertin has been encountered in the past and speak with allies in those places.

betterquesting.name: Cromhes’ Request - Lone-lands
betterquesting.desc: Cromhes has asked you to return to three places where Nerea Aubertin has been encountered in the past and speak with allies in those places.

betterquesting.name: Cromhes’ Request - Mitheithel
betterquesting.desc: Cromhes has asked you to return to three places where Nerea Aubertin has been encountered in the past and speak with allies in those places.

betterquesting.name: We need a Hero - Adventure Lads
betterquesting.desc:
A Mysterious letter, dangerous quests, sounds like someone is in need of Adventuring lads!

Looks like someone sent you mail, better go find a mailbox or postman to see what it says.

Lore:9.8: §6Doesn't this guy sound a little crazy?

betterquesting.name: Adventure Lads I
betterquesting.desc: Time to seek out this Merovech fellow.

betterquesting.name: Adventure Lads II
betterquesting.desc: Time to venture to Fornost and hopefully find a way in to the sewer.

Lore:9.8: §6Long the bane of more sensible folk, great rulers thought they had destroyed all of these devices

betterquesting.name: Adventure Lads III
betterquesting.desc: Artifact found, time to take it to Merovech.

Lore:9.8: §6Long the bane of more sensible folk, great rulers thought they had destroyed all of these devices

betterquesting.name: Chapter Start 7
betterquesting.desc: No Description

betterquesting.name: Hero of Middle-earth II
betterquesting.desc: You have a visitor in Arnor it seems, time to see why he is asking for you.

Lore:9.8: §bThurdan's story about Dreulhara

betterquesting.name: Hero of Middle-earth I
betterquesting.desc: Time to report to Talacnun.

betterquesting.name: Swift change I
betterquesting.desc: The letter given to you outlines just how truly evil Dreulhara is and has a history of what she has done prior to you becoming aware of her.  You have been tasked with delivering it to Talacnun

betterquesting.name: Swift Change II
betterquesting.desc: Talacnun seems determined to will the city of Annuminas back at any cost, regardless of what Thurdan has told him.  He has asked that you go speak to Wynton to see what part you can play in taking back Annuminas.

betterquesting.name: Swift Change III
betterquesting.desc: The rangers are faring far better in Annuminas than Talacnun realized, with the Palantir under the protection of the rangers, Wynton has asked that you reach out to Elrond to see if he has a means of transporting it safely.

Lore:9.8: §bSpecial cloth designed by the elves to carry magical items

betterquesting.name: Test of Character I
betterquesting.desc: You must return the cloth, given to you by Elrond, to the Ranger Wynton.  Also seems like Wynton may have more news for you...

betterquesting.name: Test of Character II
betterquesting.desc: You JUST came from Rivendell and Elrond is already summoning you back!  Good thing I have waypoints to make that easier...

betterquesting.name: Preparations I
betterquesting.desc: Elrond has asked that you help your fellow Men, Aragorn son of Arathorn and Boromir of Gondor, prepare to leave on their dangerous -- and secret -- mission.

betterquesting.name: You hve new quests!
betterquesting.desc: You have new quests!

betterquesting.name: Preparations - Aragorn
betterquesting.desc: Elrond has asked that you help your fellow Men, Aragorn son of Arathorn and Boromir of Gondor, prepare to leave on their dangerous -- and secret -- mission.

betterquesting.name: Preparations - Boromir
betterquesting.desc: Elrond has asked that you help your fellow Men, Aragorn son of Arathorn and Boromir of Gondor, prepare to leave on their dangerous -- and secret -- mission.

betterquesting.name: Preparations II
betterquesting.desc: You have helped both Aragorn and Boromir with their preparations and should return now to Elrond.

betterquesting.name: Grand Quest - Chasing Shadows
betterquesting.desc:
§lAll that once was....§r

 

30 years have passed since the forming of the council, Man, Dwarf and Elf.  They came together to try to stop the coming darkness in Angmar.  At the same time, you were trying to stop Draconis from destruction and to contain the evil that was spreading to the Overworld.

Sadly, one by one, the free peoples were defeated as the growing evil was stronger than anyone realized.  The last time you were here, Strider, now known as Aragorn had said something about the ring you had returned to Bilbo and Gandalf had been researching.

It will be up to you to help fight back this evil and see what can be done to help the Fellowship succeed in a new task.  Be strong traveler and know that if ever a Hero was needed, the Hero of Draconis shall be the one to answer that call!

 

§l...hope shall not fade.§r§r§r

betterquesting.name: Lands of Middle-earth
betterquesting.desc: Fast travel to be earned as you travel the lands of Middle-earth...

betterquesting.name: Job Board
betterquesting.desc: Pick up some easy money from those in need.

betterquesting.name: Scholars of Middle-earth
betterquesting.desc: Learn about some of the mechanics with help from locals.

betterquesting.name: Factions of Middle-earth
betterquesting.desc:
Throughout Middle-earth there are various factions, who may reward you if you gain sufficient standing in their eyes.

Faction may be gained by completing quests, defeating specific mobs, or turning in specific mob-drop items.

betterquesting.name: Grand Quest - Last Refuge
betterquesting.desc: Elrond feels that the Nazgûl you drove off from the Trollshaws has fled into the Misty Mountains. He has asked you to continue your pursuit of the Nazgûl with the aid of Glóin.

betterquesting.name: Grand Quest - Fires in the South
betterquesting.desc: The shadow of Angmar -- Sauron's hand in the North -- grows steadily, threatening the peace and security of Eriador.

betterquesting.name: Grand Quest - Flames of Hope
betterquesting.desc: After discovering the secret of the Watchers near Khazad-dûm, Manwyn sent you into the darkness of Moria, seeking the Rangers who had marched forth to throw down the rising power of Angmar. You found the Ranger Rurain at the dwarf-outpost deep inside.

betterquesting.name: Grand Quest - Scourge of the South
betterquesting.desc: A heavy price was paid for the rescue of Cromhes, maybe too high.  It is time to move on to other issues while Cromhes ponders what he will do now.

betterquesting.name: Grand Quest - The Cold of Forochel
betterquesting.desc: Gandalf the Grey, currently on the upper floor of the Last Homely House in Rivendell, should be informed of the actions of this Nerea Aubertin.

betterquesting.name: Grand Quest - City of Annúminas
betterquesting.desc: The battle was hard fought but more must be done.  It is time to help the rangers take back what is theirs by birthright!
